item.description:
Hope you are enjoying your Labor Day weekend!

What's a Viva Italia Meetup without some pizza!!! Well bring your appetite and $10 should cover the pizza for the evening including the "pizzolo rustico neopolitano". That's this Wednesday, Sept. 9th, 7pm at Johnny Tomato's in Wethersfield, CT. Give yourself sometime to find parking.

Mapquest > 620 Silas Deane Hwy, Wethersfield, CT for directions

See John's message in Italian below as well as his cell phone # in the event you get lost.

Ci vediamo!
Lorenzo


Il prossimo incontro avra luogo a un nuovo posto - Johnny Tomato's. Non mangiare cena. Condivideremo la pizza normale ed anche lo "pizzolo rustico neopolitano." Costera dieci dollari ciascuno. Quando i soldi spariscono, torneremo a casa. Dovresti considerare un po di tempo per trovare un posto per parcheggiare la macchina. Spero di vederti.

John

P.S. Silas Deane Highway crosses route 91 at Exit 24. Head north on Silas Deane Highway. The restaurant is on the right. There may be a closer exit. Try mapquest. iF you get lost, call me on my cell (860) 205-3715
item.name: Pizzolo Rustico - Johnny Tomato's - Wethersfield, CT
